name: Block Puzzle - Brick Breaker
description:
Block Puzzle is a fabulous combination of jigsaw and block puzzle games.

How to play?
- Simply drag the color blocks to move them.
- Create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally to break blocks.

Tips:
- Classic brick game without time limits.
- Place the blocks in a reasonable position.
- The more blocks break, the more scores you have.
- Blocks can't be rotated.

Train your brain with a relaxing, yet challenging block game!
